resources.string: Last backup was more than 3 days ago.
Please Enable Device Administration to access all features of the application, such as Device Wipe, Locking, Encryption etc.
Emergency Contacts will be contacted in case you or your mobile are in trouble. Don\'t worry you can change it any time in settings.
This will erase all your contacts, messages and settings & application data. Backup important things before you continue.

This will hide the application launcher icon & notifications. 

You can start the application by dialing *#2337#*. 

Auto tracking, Auto Backups will remained enabled.
Click & Hold a file for more options
Ceeq is an app to protect you and your device, to backup your data. It provides features such as remote commands, auto backups and much more. \nVisit http://ceeq.in/about to read more about us.
GPS is required for accuracy while getting the location of device, in distress situations or while using the application.
Device administrator feature helps the application to wipe, lock your device remotely.

Remote Commands are messages which you may send in case your device is lost. 

 To use a remote command, type the remote command, followed by your pin ex. CEEQ LOCATE 000000. 

 The main remote commands are 
1. CEEQ ALARM : sounds a loud alarm on your mobile, 
2. CEEQ LOCK : locks your device, 
3. CEEQ ERASE : completely erases your device of any data, 
4. CEEQ NOW : sends you the current sim number, imsi number and other mobile details, 
5. CEEQ CALLS : sends you the last 10 called numbers, 
6. CEEQ SPY : spies on the device location and calls and send them to you, 
7. CEEQ LOCATE : sends you the last stored location, and any new location if location of mobile changes.
We have explained each and every permission at http://www.ceeq.in/permissions. \nStill, they are just required to give you most features.

Protect me feature has been added for distress situations, just double tap power button and rapidly tap Home button to send an SOS message to your emergency contact.\nThe same message will be posted to you social accounts too.
Online Sync, saves your backup data over Google Drive, which are used to restore data if in case you loose your phone or SD card.
One click backup simply backs up everything i.e contacts, messages, call logs, etc just by one click.

Stealth Mode hides the application icon & its notifications.\nDon\'t worry you can still launch the application by dialing *#*#2337#*#*. Note, it won\'t stops the background process such as Auto Backups, or device Tracking

We highly respect your privacy and data, and so this application in no way collects any data from your mobile.\nWe just store your email address, so you can access the application from the web, seriously that\'s all we need.

Yup, we are right at your back.
Contact us anytime by sending us your message at 
support@ceeq.in 
or visiting and posting at 
http://ceeq.in/contact, 
we will contact you within minutes, okay mostly in an hour ;).

This project has been developed for SCHOLARLY purposes, and it is being shared with you for FREE so that you can enjoy our work and your gadget is safe too.\nIf you have any suggestions, or found bugs, any feedbacks, you can shout at us at support@ceeq.in.\nThis project by no means collects any user data for any purpose.
P.S. Your Google account is connected.
Autoblip will inform you about phone details and location on low battery.
Please Enable Device Administration to access all features of the application, such as Device Wipe, Locking, Encryption etc.
Emergency Contacts will be contacted in case you or your mobile are in trouble. Don\'t worry you can change it any time in settings.
Enabling Device Administration enables all the security features of the application such as remote wipe, remote lock, remote commands.
Please type a message for us.
We heartly welcome your suggestions & feedbacks.
Note. This will be sent to your emergency contact & posted to your social accounts.
You are formating your external storage. Backup important things before you continue.
You need to activate Device administration to use this feature. This will also let you remotely wipe your device.
By disabling device administrator for Ceeq you will loose the features of lock, and wipe. Rest all features will still work.
Note: In case you haven\'t secured your lockscreen, this PIN will be used to lock the device when SIM is changed, or when you have uninstall protection ON.
In case you haven\'t secured your lockscreen, your Ceeq PIN will be used to protect the application from unauthorised uninstallation.
Sorry, You forgot to set the pin !
